courses.title: HECPO Hostile Environment Close Protection Operative
courses.description: HECPO – Hostile Environment Close Protection Operator (ISSA) The HECPO Course is an advanced program designed for professionals aiming to operate in high-risk and hostile environments, where close protection services are essential. Delivered by instructors with extensive international operational experience, the course combines tactical expertise, operational planning, and immersive practical simulations, preparing participants for real-world deployment in challenging conditions.

courses.title: 5 Days HEAT – Hostile Environment Awareness Training
courses.description: Dettaglio del corso HEAT: durata 5 giorni, argomenti trattati: riconoscimento minacce, movimento in convoglio, first aid di base, procedure di sicurezza. Requisiti: forma fisica base. Certificazione rilasciata al completamento.

courses.title: 10 Days ISSA Executive Close Protection Operative Level V
courses.description: 10-Day Close Protection Operator (CPO) — ISSA A professional transformation. Not just a course.

courses.title: 14 Days Executive Close Protection Officer Level V + Executive FAR + Pistol Level I + CCW
courses.description: Dettaglio ECPO: 14 giorni combinati comprendenti Executive FAR, Pistol Level I e CCW. Requisiti e note logistiche incluse.

courses.title: Security Driver
courses.short_description: Formazione pratica per conducenti di sicurezza.
courses.long_description: Our security driver course is a fundamental part of the Close Protection Officer (CPO) job. Increasingly, bodyguards are often asked to also drive VIP vehicles. During the course, the latest procedures related to vehicles will be analyzed, including their features, strengths, and weaknesses. An important aspect will be the vehicle control to minimize any possibility of accidents.
